# Troubleshooting and Cautionary Notes

## Known Issues

- The "data storage" is not mounted yet.

- Sometimes the graphic device is not accessible in an R session. This currently happens without a clear pattern and it is not clear yet which system library (or maybe a sequence of loading R packages) is causing it.

## Cautionary Notes


## FAQ

Q: I ran `sinfo` and saw that the state of the nodes is "down".
A: Please contact the admin (patrick.schratz@uni-jena.de) to resume the nodes.

Q: I ran `sinfo` and see that some nodes have status "mix" and some "alloc". What are the differences?
A: "mix" means that the node is not fully loaded and is in a mixed state between processing and being idle. "alloc" means that the node is fully allocated.
